data.actual_result: The loading icon appears, going on forever
data.expected_result: When tapping on a message, a search/message preview should up, as it usually does
data.short_description: Search/Message preview doesn't work after switching theme [iPhone/iPod only]
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to User Settings > Appearance and switch your theme - Go to a server, search for something and tap on a message - Or tap on the Recent Mentions button and tap on a message - Observe
